LimeNetworking: Extreme Bandwidth (200TB) Dedi in KC, Plus KVMs in Dallas and cPanel Starting at $1/mo!

cpanel, dallas, high bandwidth, kansas city, lime networking, limenetworking, shared hosting April 16, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome, LimeNetworking!  They’re a New Zealand company who is bringing us a smattering of offers:

  • Dual Xeon 5150 with 200TB of transfer and 4x250GB disks for $70/mo in Kansas City.  It’s a pretty old CPU but that’s a lot of bits down the wire and with 4 drives you can setup RAID.
  • 2GB VPS with 2TB of bandwidth in Dallas for $4/mo.
  • cPanel starting at $1/mo with no annual commitment

Interesting choices and I think they’re looking to stand out by not offering the same as everyone else, and for that I salute them.

They are registered in New Zealand (NZBN 9429047129047). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site (AUP). They accept PayPal, Bitcoin, credit card, debit card.

Here’s a little about LimeNetworking in their own words:

“Limenetworking, our main aim is providing good quality service at cheapest cost. Everything we do at Limenetworking has a long-term view in mind, from the selection of hardware to software, and, especially, our staffs! We believe that we must make the best investment on our human resources so that we could provide the best support to our customers.”

Have you been a LimeNetworking customer? Please share your experience in the comments below.

Now read more to see the offers!
